divs: sighting detailsin july 1965, myself and two other persons saw a flying object at tree top level while at a job corp rural training center. the camp was in the hills\forest north of little rock, ca. years later, while watching a television program hosted by larry king and area 51 as a back drop, a male caller, related the same story to mr. king. {pid} {cms\jay\pid} text moved to narrative
Summary: Object flying tree top level east-bount, no sound.
trends: There have been 106 other sightings in San Jose
There were no other sightings in San Jose on or around July 27th 1965
